post.title: fs: used sony x10 and samsung wave
post.content: i would like to unload one of the two devices i have, since i just got the iphone 4. i paid retail for both units from rogers plus store. they are fairly new, conditions are 9.5/10 sony x10 bought from rogers but unlocked $370 samsung wave locked to rogers $300 please contact me at josavisno@gmail.com location dealings within the markham area only thanks
